raw_infobox.name: Kawhi Leonard
raw_infobox.caption: Leonard in 2022
raw_infobox.college: San Diego State Aztecs men's basketball (2009–2011)
raw_infobox.highlights:
* 2× NBA champion (2014 NBA Finals, 2019 NBA Finals)
* 2× NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2014 NBA Finals, 2019 NBA Finals)
* 6× NBA All-Star (2016, 2017, 2019–2021, 2024)
* NBA All-Star Game Kobe Bryant Most Valuable Player Award (2020)
* 3× All-NBA First Team (2015, 2016, 2020)
* 3× All-NBA Second Team (2018, 2019, 2023)
* 2× NBA Defensive Player of the Year Award (2014, 2015)
* 3× NBA All-Defensive First Team (2014–2016)
* 4× NBA All-Defensive Second Team (2013, 2018–2020)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (2011)
* List of National Basketball Association annual steals leaders (2014)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* Associated Press Athlete of the Year (2019)
* Consensus second-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (2011 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* 2× First-team All-Mountain West Conference (2010, 2011)
* No. 15 San Diego State Aztecs men's basketball#Retired numbers
* California Mr. Basketball (2009)
}}
